cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT Analytics_Conversion.*,StatisticsObjectName, SUM (HitsCount) AS HitsCount,SUM(HitsValue) AS HitsValues FROM Analytics_Conversion LEFT JOIN Analytics_Statistics ON StatisticsCode = 'conversion' AND StatisticsObjectName = ConversionName AND StatisticsSiteID = ConversionSiteID LEFT JOIN Analytics_YearHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_YearHits.HitsStatisticsID WHERE ##WHERE## GROUP BY ConversionLastModified,ConversionSiteID, ConversionGUID,ConversionDescription,ConversionName,ConversionID,ConversionDisplayName,StatisticsObjectName ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##) AS X
